channel.title: [RSCD] Aproaching "dead" trees

item.title: [RSCD] Aproaching "dead" trees
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Intoxication:

Do you have it set for every dead tree? I don’t remember every tree doing that.

Nope, just for trees with the object id “88”, those have the “aproach” and “search” options and not the “chop” option.

Read full topic

item.title: [RSCD] Aproaching "dead" trees
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

latifundio:

private Player player;

This isn’t needed. The block of code never calls the object player. It uses ‘owner’ instead, if you added that because of ‘Player’, that’s referring to the class Player.

Intoxication:

Do you have it set for every dead tree? I don’t remember every tree doing that.

Ye it was only a couple trees that actually hit you

Read full topic

If anyone getting an error just add this import

item.title: [RSCD] Aproaching "dead" trees
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

case 88: // Live trees owner.setBusy(true); owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The tree seems to lash out at you!"); World.getWorld().getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The tree seems to lash out at you!"); int damage = owner.getCurStat(3) / 5; owner.setLastDamage(damage); owner.setCurStat(3, owner.getCurStat(3) - damage); owner.getActionSender().sendStat(3); ArrayList<Player> playersToInform = new ArrayList<Player>(); playersToInform.addAll(owner.getViewArea().getPlayersInView()); for (Player p : playersToInform) p.informOfModifiedHits(owner); owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You are badly scratched by the tree"); owner.setBusy(false); } }); break;

Read full topic

item.title: [RSCD] Aproaching "dead" trees
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Hello, i want to replicate this

The only thing Im missing is that it doesn’t show the red star with the damage made on me , hope someone can help me on this.

[code]case 88: // Live trees

	owner.setBusy(true);

	owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("The tree seems to lash out at you!");

	World.getWorld().getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

			public void action() {

			int damage = owner.getCurStat(3) / 5;

			owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You are badly scratched by the tree");	

			owner.setLastDamage(damage);

			owner.setCurStat(3, owner.getCurStat(3) - damage);
			owner.getActionSender().sendStat(3);

													

			owner.setBusy(false);

					}

			});

			break;[/code]

Read full topic
